title: Exquisite Diamond Vaddanam with Tanzanite & Emerald Accents - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish
and vibrant Emerald gemstones. Features intricate detailing with gold beads.
features: This Vaddanam showcases a traditional South Indian design, re-imagined with modern sensibilities. It features a repeating floral motif, each centerpiece adorned with a striking Tanzanite, accented with clusters of Emeralds, and surrounded by meticulously pavé-set Diamonds. The design includes delicate diamond-studded 'drop' embellishments and incorporates traditional peacock (mayura) detailing within the central pieces. The secure clasp is seamlessly integrated into the overall design.
colors: The piece exhibits a rich palette of golden yellow (gold)
and lush green (emeralds). The contrast creates a visually stunning and regal effect.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaham/పెళ్లి)
or any celebratory event where you wish to make a statement. Also suitable for upscale cultural events or classical dance performances.
description: This Vaddanam is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, combining traditional design elements with modern stone setting techniques. The use of high-quality Diamonds, Tanzanite, and Emeralds ensures brilliance and enduring value. Its cultural significance as an auspicious adornment makes it a treasured heirloom piece to be passed down through generations. Owning this Vaddanam isn't just about acquiring jewelry; it's about embracing South Indian heritage and artistry.
